members.member: ——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— CLASS: ActionShell. USAGE: Builds a request scoped context data. enter delegate is called before entry to endpoint. leave delegate is called after endpoint is run. The request scope is passed to these delegates and since it is also stored into HttpContext, it is accessible from the controller and even Global exception middleware in case of any exceptions. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— TYPE: OnEnterDelegate TASK: Method delegate type to call before entry to endpoint.
ARGS: scope: RequestScopeBase : Current request scope instance. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— TYPE: OnLeaveDelegate TASK: Method delegate type to call after leaving the endpoint.
ARGS: scope: RequestScopeBase : Current request scope instance. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— PROP: enter. TASK: Method delegate to call before entry to endpoint.
Method delegate type must be OnEnterDelegate.
The method should be static. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— PROP: leave. TASK: Method delegate to call after leaving the endpoint.
Method delegate type must be OnLeaveDelegate.
The method should be static. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— PROP: requestScopeType. TASK: This must be a descendant of class RequestScopeBase.
This allows developers to define a class that gathers
data tailored for the project from the context.
Instance will be created by OnActionExecuting,
Just before ActionShell.enter is called.
This is an assignment because attribute classes does not
allow generics. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— FUNC: fetchScope TASK: Accesses to scope data stored in HttpContext.
ARGS: httpContext : HttpContext : Current http context.
RETV: : RequestScopeBase : Scope if any or null. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
